projects.title: Lumnia Identity
projects.tagline: Illuminating brand presence through digital innovation.
projects.description: A comprehensive digital rebranding for Lumnia, focusing on light-inspired aesthetics and seamless user interaction.
projects.problem: Lumnia's legacy web presence failed to communicate their core value proposition: clarity and speed. They needed a site that felt instantaneous and radiant.
projects.solution: We engineered a static-first Next.js architecture with WebGL lighting effects that react to user cursors, symbolizing the company's focus on illumination.

projects.title: Prism Collective
projects.description: An artist portfolio community platform designed to showcase diverse creative works in a unified grid system.
projects.problem: Artists struggled to display mixed-media portfolios (video, 3D, image) in a coherent way without sacrificing load speed.
projects.solution: We built a custom masonry grid handler that dynamically optimizes geometry based on asset aspect ratios, ensuring a perfect visual fit for every piece.

projects.title: Vertex Studio
projects.description: A minimalist showcase for an architectural firm, emphasizing space, typography, and large-scale imagery.
projects.problem: Vertex needed to display high-resolution architectural renders without overwhelming the browser or the user's data connection.
projects.solution: Implemented a progressive image loading strategy with LQIP (Low Quality Image Placeholders) and hardware-accelerated transitions.

projects.title: Aura Branding
projects.description: A corporate site that breaks the mold with fluid gradients and glassmorphism.
projects.problem: Corporate branding often feels sterile. Aura wanted to convey warmth and fluidity while remaining professional.
projects.solution: Utilized CSS-only mesh gradients and backdrop-filter effects to create a 'living' background that shifts subtly over time.

projects.title: Zephyr Lab
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard for a climate research institute.
projects.problem: Complex weather data needs to be digestible for the general public, not just scientists.
projects.solution: Created interactive SVG charts and D3.js integrations that allow users to 'play' with weather models in real-time.

projects.title: Origin Brand
projects.description: An e-commerce storefront for sustainable goods.
projects.problem: Standard e-commerce templates felt too heavy and generic for a brand focused on sustainability and minimalism.
projects.solution: A headless Shopify build using a custom lightweight frontend to reduce carbon footprint via minimized data transfer.

projects.title: Nexus Platform
projects.description: An internal communication tool for Fortune 500 companies.
projects.problem: Large organizations suffer from fragmented communication across departments.
projects.solution: A unified messaging stream that integrates with existing ERPs to bring alerts and chats into one secure feed.

projects.title: Zeni Finance
projects.description: A next-generation personal finance wallet and budgeting assistant.
projects.problem: Personal finance management is often reactive and stressful, with users struggling to make sense of scattered transaction data.
projects.solution: We created Zeni, an AI-powered financial assistant that proactively identifies savings opportunities and gamifies the budgeting process with 'Savings Challenges'.

projects.title: Flow Systems
projects.description: Project management software focused on 'flow state'.
projects.problem: PM tools are often cluttered, interrupting deep work.
projects.solution: A 'Focus Mode' interface that hides all non-essential UI elements when a timer is running.

projects.title: Code Nest
projects.description: An educational app with gamified coding challenges.
projects.problem: Learning to code on mobile is usually just multiple choice. Users wanted to write actual code.
projects.solution: Built a custom syntax-highlighting text editor optimized for touch keyboards.

projects.title: Dev Port
projects.description: A job seeking platform specifically for developer portfolios.
projects.problem: Resumes don't show code quality.
projects.solution: Integration with GitHub API to visualize contribution graphs and highlight top repositories directly in the application.

projects.title: Crypto Wallet
projects.description: A non-custodial wallet design focusing on trust and clarity.
projects.problem: Crypto apps are notoriously confusing for new users.
projects.solution: We removed technical jargon and used biological/organic shapes to make the interface feel friendly and safe.

projects.title: Social Connect
projects.description: A social app concept for local meetups.
projects.problem: Event apps feel transactional.
projects.solution: Focused on 'warm' UI elements and map-based discovery to encourage spontaneous connection.

projects.title: Health Tracker
projects.description: Wellness app focusing on holistic metrics.
projects.problem: Health data can look like a medical chart, inducing anxiety.
projects.solution: Used soft pastels and rounded varying graphs to present health data as a lifestyle narrative rather than a medical report.

projects.title: Finance Dash
projects.description: Fintech dashboard for SME owners.
projects.problem: Small business owners are too busy to dig through spreadsheets.
projects.solution: A modular dashboard widget system where users can pin their most critical KPIs to the top.

projects.title: UX Wireframe
projects.description: High-fidelity wireframe kit for rapid prototyping.
projects.problem: Designers spend too much time reinventing basic components.
projects.solution: A master component library with 500+ atomic elements.

projects.title: Urban Rhythms
projects.description: A lifestyle blog for urban explorers.
projects.problem: Heavy blog themes were hurting SEO rankings.
projects.solution: A custom lightweight theme stripping away 90% of standard WP bloat for lightning-fast speeds.

projects.title: Natural States
projects.description: Gallery theme for landscape photographers.
projects.problem: Standard galleries croppped images incorrectly.
projects.solution: An adaptive fullscreen gallery that respects the photographer's original aspect ratios.

projects.title: Silent Woods
projects.description: Booking site for cabin rentals.
projects.problem: Booking flows are often stressful and urgent.
projects.solution: A calming, slow-paced booking experience with large nature imagery and simplified steps.

projects.title: Digital Flora
projects.description: Plant identification SaaS.
projects.problem: Identifying plants requires expert knowledge.
projects.solution: AI-powered image recognition API that developers can integrate into any app.

projects.title: Neon Nights
projects.description: POS and reservation system for clubs.
projects.problem: Clubs struggling with manual guest lists and capacity tracking.
projects.solution: Real-time capacity counting and QR code entry system.

projects.title: Abstract Worlds
projects.description: Procedural generation tool for VR devs.
projects.problem: Creating VR assets is time consuming.
projects.solution: A web-based generator that creates exportable 3D environments in seconds.
